'''17w13b''' is the third [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.12]], released on March 31, 2017.<ref>{{snap|17w13a|March 31, 2017}}</ref> It adds the gray-yellow parrot and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Parrot]]s'''
*[[File:Gray Parrot.png|32px]] Added gray-yellow parrot, resembling a cockatiel.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=17w13b|prefix=Minecraft
|;previous
|114878|Crash: <code>Initializing game - java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Unable to load library</code>
|114881|Some entity block models do not render.
|114883|No recipes unlocking on server.
|114891|Advancement window is blank when no advancements are unlocked.
|114893|Parrots being erased from existence if too many are held.
|114909|Parrots' Eye Level isn't Aligned with their Model's Eyes.
|114933|Parrots don't Imitate Cave Spiders.
|114936|Game crashes when trying to use crafting book and items needed are in off-hand or armor slots.
|114937|Parrots show hearts when clicked with wheat.
|115004|"Summon the Wither" advancement checks to see if you summoned the ender dragon.
|115026|Message in the chat: New recipe unlocked for minecraft.
|115098|Parrots unrestricted spawning causing world to inevitably crash from the number of entities.
|115101|"full" option for the "inventory_changed" trigger inversely compares stack size.
}}</onlyinclude>
